sect2.title: Introduction to LPRng
sect2.para: The LPRng package contains an enhanced, extended and portable implementation of the Berkeley Line PRinter (LPR) print spooler. This is useful for queuing print jobs.

sect2.title: Installation of LPRng
sect2.para: Install LPRng by running the following commands:

sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: There is no generic printcap for all printers. A sample printcap is loaded into the /etc directory which can be of some help. Information is also available at and .
The init script installed by LPRng is not consistent with other BLFS scripts; therefore, install the /etc/rc.d/init.d/lprng init script included in the package.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The LPRng package contains cancel, checkpc, lp, lpc, lpd, lpq, lpr, lprm, lprng_certs, lprng_index_certs, lpstat and liblpr.

sect3.title: cancel
sect3.para: cancel sends cancel requests to an LPRng print service.

sect3.title: checkpc
sect3.para: checkpc checks out the printcap database.

sect3.title: lp
sect3.para: lp sends requests to an LPRng print service.

sect3.title: lpc
sect3.para: lpc is the control program for the daemon.

sect3.title: lpq
sect3.para: lpq is the status monitoring program.

sect3.title: lpr
sect3.para: lpr is the job spooler program.

sect3.title: lprm
sect3.para: lprm is the job removal program.

sect3.title: lprng_certs
sect3.para: lprng_certs is a program used to manage SSL certificates for the LPRng software.

sect3.title: lprng_index_certs
sect3.para: lprng_index_certs creates a set of index files in the LPRng signing certificate directory.

sect3.title: lpstat
sect3.para: lpstat is the job status program.
